mapper.select: SELECT * FROM JOB ORDER BY JOB_NO

SELECT COUNT(USER_NO) FROM IAG_USER
WHERE USER_NO LIKE '%'|| #{search}||'%' OR TRIM(REPLACE(PHONE,'-','')) LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'

SELECT * FROM IAG_USER U LEFT OUTER JOIN POSITION P ON (U.POSITION_NO = P.POSITION_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (D.DEPARTMENT_NO = U.DEPARTMENT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN JOB J ON (J.JOB_NO = U.JOB_NO) WHERE END_DATE IS NULL

SELECT LEVEL, CONNECT_BY_ROOT DEPARTMENT_NO AS "ROOT_DEPARTMENT", CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS "LEAF", DEPARTMENT_NO, DEPARTMENT_NAME, TOP_DEPARTMENT FROM DEPARTMENT START WITH TOP_DEPARTMENT IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPARTMENT_NO = TOP_DEPARTMENT ORDER BY LEVEL, DEPARTMENT_NO
